name: ai-feedback-bridge
description: Bridges feedback from AI Agent system to GitHub Copilot for recursive improvement

chatParticipants.name: agent
chatParticipants.description: Processes feedback from external AI agent systems

aiFeedbackBridge.port.description: HTTP server port for feedback bridge

aiFeedbackBridge.autoStart.description: Automatically start the feedback server when VS Code launches

aiFeedbackBridge.autoContinue.enabled.description: Enable auto-continue to send periodic reminders to Copilot Chat

aiFeedbackBridge.autoContinue.message.default: Continue with tasks, improvements, code coverage, please. Prioritize improvements, code robustness, maintainability. Cleanup unused files if you need to. Periodically commit.
aiFeedbackBridge.autoContinue.message.description: Message sent to Copilot Chat at each interval

aiFeedbackBridge.autoApproval.enabled.description: Enable auto-approval monitoring (requires manual console script setup)

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
